Text:
I love the fact you are making these is quality. But they should be put under HD or high res. Not regular tv. Kinda sucks looking for current tv shows and get my screen filled with 30 single episodes of one show then another 24 of another show and so on.
Not trying to be an ass.
Would save people a lot of time as well if you were to put them in a single torrent. People can choose what they want out of it in their torrent client.
If they can't they don't deserve to use torrents in the first place.
This isn't Gnutella anymore!
